note.p: Education: Apprenticed to his father; Copenhagen (1690-1694)

Career: Travelled to Sweden (1693), Danzig (1696), Holland, Belgium and England; brought back a collection of books on natural history and an impressive cabinet of curiosities; worked in Naumburg (1706-1710), then in his father's pharmacy, taking over from his father (1717)
Memberships: Deutsche Akademie der Naturforscher Leopoldina (1722); Istituto delle Scienze e Arti di Bologna (1723)
